tasks.label: Build
tasks.command: sudo docker run -it  -v /home/matt/Code/OpenController-ESP32:/project -w /project docker.io/espressif/idf:release-v5.0 idf.py build

tasks.label: Flash
tasks.command: sudo docker run -it  -v /home/matt/Code/OpenController-ESP32:/project -w /project --device=/dev/ttyUSB0 docker.io/espressif/idf:release-v5.0 idf.py -p /dev/ttyUSB0 flash

tasks.label: Monitor
tasks.command: sudo docker run -it  -v /home/matt/Code/OpenController-ESP32:/project -w /project --device=/dev/ttyUSB0 docker.io/espressif/idf:release-v5.0 idf.py -p /dev/ttyUSB0 monitor
